topic.title: macOS: Starting the Web Service With launchd

body.p: On macOS, launchd is used to start the Oracle VM VirtualBox webservice. An example configuration file can be found in $HOME/Library/LaunchAgents/org.virtualbox.vboxwebsrv.plist. It can be enabled by changing the Disabled key from true to false. To manually start the service use the following command:
For additional information on how launchd services could be configured see:
